trans-unit.source: Provides client connections for TCP network services.
trans-unit.target: 提供为 TCP 网络服务的客户端连接。

trans-unit.source: The TcpClient class provides simple methods for connecting, sending, and receiving stream data over a network in synchronous blocking mode.
trans-unit.target: TcpClient 类通过同步阻止模式下的网络连接、 发送，和接收流数据提供简单的方法。

trans-unit.source: In order for TcpClient to connect and exchange data, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> created with the TCP <xref:System.Net.Sockets.ProtocolType> must be listening for incoming connection requests.
trans-unit.target: 为了使 TcpClient 进行连接并与其交换数据，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>创建与 TCP<xref:System.Net.Sockets.ProtocolType>必须侦听传入连接请求。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.ProtocolType> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>

trans-unit.source: You can connect to this listener in one of the following two ways: - Create a TcpClient and call one of the three available <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你在两种方法可以连接到此侦听器在下列情况之一:-创建 TcpClient 并调用其中一个可用的三个<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Create a TcpClient using the host name and port number of the remote host.
trans-unit.target: -创建 TcpClient 使用主机名和端口号远程主机。

trans-unit.source: This constructor will automatically attempt a connection.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数将自动尝试连接。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you want to send connectionless datagrams in synchronous blocking mode, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> class.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果你想要在同步阻止的模式下发送无连接数据报，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>类。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> and allows the underlying service provider to assign the most appropriate local IP address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建一个新<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>和允许基础服务提供程序分配的最合适的本地 IP 地址和端口号。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>

trans-unit.source: You must first call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A> method before sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 必须先调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>之前发送和接收数据的方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This constructor works only with IPv4 address types.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此构造函数仅适用于 IPv4 地址类型。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪，此成员将输出跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient"></xref> class and binds it to the specified local endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient"></xref>类并将其绑定到指定的本地终结点。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> and binds it to the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> specified by the `localEP` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建一个新<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>和将其绑定到<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>指定的`localEP`参数。</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>

trans-unit.source: Before you call this constructor, you must create an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> using the IP address and port number from which you intend to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: 在调用此构造函数之前，必须创建<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>使用你想要发送和接收数据的 IP 地址和端口号。</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to specify a local IP address and port number before connecting and communicating.
trans-unit.target: 不需要连接和通信之前指定本地 IP 地址和端口号。

trans-unit.source: If you create a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> using any other constructor, the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local IP address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果你创建<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>使用任何其他构造函数，则基础的服务提供程序将分配的最合适的本地 IP 地址和端口号。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A> method before sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 必须调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>之前发送和接收数据的方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪，此成员将输出跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> to which you bind the TCP <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>你要向其绑定 TCP <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: The localEP parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The localEP parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient"></xref> class with the specified family.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient"></xref>使用指定的族的类。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]1> 当你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪，此成员将输出跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
